sentences.sContent: Letting taxes rise abruptly would hurt not only the recovery but also whichever party the electorate ended up blaming.
sentences.sContent_eng: Letting taxes rise abruptly would hurt not only the recovery but also whichever party the electorate ended up blaming.
sentences.sCn: 突然的增税不但会妨害经济复苏，而且无论哪个政党这样做都会受到选民指责。
